modName: EGV - Extreme glow Vision for extreme low end pcs
summary: I allways enjoy detailed bloom and flares in games. Now these Effects get pushed into Skyrim with a absolute minimal fps loss. I got a weak system myself so I know what I am talking about when I say "low fps loss", trust me.
descriptionHtml:
You like ENB. You love all the features, but your system is too weak for the new ENB Binary files?
Try this ENB preset. It will fill your screen with bright days and dark night, colorful flowers and an awesome anamorphic flare.
I tweaked the ENBBloom.txt/ini and ENBseries.txt for allmost 2 months now, and I am kinda pleased with the result.






Features:
- Glowing Bloom and bright saturation while maintaning a clear vision.
- Anamorphic lens flare that (probably) not looks like a sci-fi movie directed by JJA
- Colorful... colors!
- Dark nights. Moons and Aurora are more beautiful.
- Better lighting in Dungeons and Buildings: Spots that should be dark are dark, while brighter ones are brighter.
- And the best of all: It will drop your fps by less than 5 frames!






Required:
ENB Binary files - 0.102 (Tatsudoshi)
- get it here - http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm





Highly recommeded:
Lanterns on the roads by Svabbarjack
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10143/?
not neccessary but, well you will find out why.

DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field by Gopher and MyGoodEye
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?
Because of absolute ZERO fps loss and it looks awesome!
I use it myself.


Credits:
ENB - Boris Vorontsov
Lanterns on the Roads - Svabbarjack
Dynavision depth of field - Gopher, MyGoodEye
Skyrim - Bethesda
author: LaBeatBeatbox
